1.title: Hosea's Marriage Symbolism
1.keyEvent: God commands Hosea to marry Gomer as a sign

2.title: Israel's Unfaithfulness
2.keyEvent: God depicts Israel's spiritual adultery and judgment

3.title: Hosea Redeems Gomer
3.keyEvent: Hosea redeems his unfaithful wife as a symbol

4.title: Israel's Corruption
4.keyEvent: God accuses Israel of lack of knowledge and sin

5.title: Judgment on Ephraim and Judah
5.keyEvent: God pronounces judgment for Israel's rebellion

6.title: Call to Repentance
6.keyEvent: God desires steadfast love and knowledge, not sacrifice

8.title: Israel's Idolatry
8.keyEvent: Israel's reliance on foreign alliances and idols

10.title: Israel's Guilt and Punishment
10.keyEvent: Israel's pride and idolatry lead to ruin

11.title: God's Compassion on Israel
11.keyEvent: God recalls Israel's early love despite rebellion

12.title: Jacob's Deceit and God's Justice
12.keyEvent: God calls Israel to repentance and truth

13.title: Israel's Sin and Punishment
13.keyEvent: Israel's destruction due to idolatry and pride

14.title: Call to Repentance and Restoration
14.keyEvent: God promises healing and blessing for repentance
